short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highly customizable new tab extension with categorized bookmark groups

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Open-source, minimalistic new tab page extension. Be more productive with bookmarks categorized to custom categories like: Work, Home and more, and if you feel sneaky use the built-in dark theme, or if you fancy more colors - create your own theme!

Some of the Simple Start features:
- Bookmark any website you like to.
- Categorize your bookmarks.
- Synchronize bookmarks and groups between devices - with Firefox Account.
- Very customizable - change font size and color, change the icon capsule size and more.
- Built-in light and dark theme.
- Create your own themes.

For synchronization to work you need to be logged into your Google account.
